Texts.Chs: 把^orange;啤酒^reset;带给我。（位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;）
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;beer^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 哇！现在你可以制作属于你自己的啤酒了，你离完美的生活又近了一步！
Texts.Eng: Cheers! Now that you can make your own beer, your life is one step closer to perfection.

Texts.Chs: 快来参加^blue;啤酒节^reset;！用^orange;发酵罐^reset;酿造3份^green;啤酒^reset;。你需要1份^orange;麦芽汁^reset;，2份^orange;啤酒花^reset;，2份^orange;小麦^reset;，1份^orange;酵母水^reset;还有1个^orange;空瓶^reset;。
Texts.Eng: It's ^blue;beer time^reset;! Go to your ^orange;Fermenter^reset; to make 3 ^green;Beer^reset;. You'll need 1 ^orange;Wort^reset;, 2 ^orange;Hops^reset;, 2 ^orange;Wheat^reset;, 1 ^orange;Yeast Water^reset; and 1 ^orange;Empty Bottle^reset;.
